home.description: Lantern & Pine takes its name from Ahmad Shamlu's poignant verse about illuminating dark paths. Like the poet's lantern hung defiantly on a barren pine, we seek to cast light in overlooked places through collective study.

footnote.credit: cc {date} Fanus vs Kaj. All Code Reversed (and Forked).
